required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study of LaNova Medicines(LM)-302 in Patients With Advance Solid Tumors
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I, First-in-Human, Open-Label, Dose Escalation and Expansion Study of LM-302 in Patients With Claudin(CLDN)18.2-Positive Advanced Solid Tumors

brief_summary.textblock: A Phase I, First-in-Human, Open-Label, Dose Escalation and Expansion Study of LM-302 in Patients with CLDN18.2-Positive Advanced Solid Tumors

detailed_description.textblock:
A Phase I, First-in-Human, Open-Label, Dose Escalation and Expansion Study of LM-302 in Patients with CLDN18.2-Positive Advanced Solid Tumors
The study schedule includes screening visit (28 days prior to accept the investigational medicinal product (IMP)), treatment visit (accept IMP for the first time to the end of treatment (EOT)/early withdrawal), and follow-up visit (28 days after the EOT/early withdrawal).

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Arm1:LM302 0.2 mg/kg i.v., QW×3 weeks group; Arm2:LM302 0.4 mg/kg i.v., QW×3 weeks group; Arm3:LM302 0.8 mg/kg i.v., QW×3 weeks group; Arm4:LM302 1.6 mg/kg i.v., QW×3 weeks group; Arm5:LM302 2.4 mg/kg i.v., QW×3 weeks group; Arm6:LM302 2.8 mg/kg i.v., QW×3 weeks group;

primary_outcome.time_frame: Cycle 1 of each cohort. Duration of one cycle is 21 days
primary_outcome.description: DLT is defined as a toxicity (adverse event at least possibly related to LM302) occurring during the DLT observation period

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with adverse events and serious adverse events
primary_outcome.time_frame: From the first administration in Cycle 1 date 1(C1D1)up to 1 year
primary_outcome.description: The safety profile of LM302 will be assessed by monitoring the adverse events (AE) per the National Cancer Institute Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events (NCI CTCAE) v5.0

primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline C1D1through approximately 1 year after first administration of LM302
primary_outcome.description: Change in vital signs-ear temperature will be measured after the subject has been fully rested

primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline C1D1through approximately 1 year after first administration of LM302
primary_outcome.description: Change in vital signs-pluse rate will be measured after the subject has been fully rested.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline C1D1through approximately 1 year after first administration of LM302
primary_outcome.description: Change in vital signs-systolic pressure will be measured after the subject has been fully rested.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in Vital Signs-diastolic blood pressure
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline C1D1through approximately 1 year after first administration of LM302
primary_outcome.description: Change in vital signs-diastolic blood pressure will be measured after the subject has been fully rested.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline C1D1through approximately 1 year after first administration of LM302
primary_outcome.description: Change in Physical examination-weight will be measured with only light clothes

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of Abnormal Clinical Laboratory Test Results-hematology
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline C1D1through approximately 1 year after first administration of LM302
primary_outcome.description: Number of participants with incidence of abnormal clinical lab test results like hematology will be assessed.

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of Abnormal Clinical Laboratory Test Results-Biochemistry
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline C1D1through approximately 1 year after first administration of LM302
primary_outcome.description: Number of participants with incidence of abnormal clinical lab test results like Biochemistry will be assessed

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of Abnormal Clinical Laboratory Test Results-Urinalysis
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline C1D1through approximately 1 year after first administration of LM302
primary_outcome.description: Number of participants with incidence of abnormal clinical lab test results like Urinalysis will be assessed.

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of Abnormal Clinical Laboratory Test Results-Coagulation test
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline C1D1through approximately 1 year after first administration of LM302
primary_outcome.description: Number of participants with incidence of abnormal clinical lab test results like Coagulation test will be assessed

primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline C1D1through approximately 1 year after first administration of LM302
primary_outcome.description: RR interval of 12-lead ECG will be performed in the supine position after the patients are fully rested at each timepoint for once. RR is the standard heart rate which calculated by 60 divided by heart rate.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline C1D1through approximately 1 year after first administration of LM302
primary_outcome.description: QT interval of 12-lead ECG will be performed in the supine position after the patients are fully rested at each timepoint for once.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline C1D1through approximately 1 year after first administration of LM302
primary_outcome.description: QRS duration of 12-lead ECG will be performed in the supine position after the patients are fully rested at each timepoint for once.

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the serum concentration versus time curve within one dosing interval (AUCtau)
secondary_outcome.description: Blood samples will be collected at time points of 0 h, immediately after infusion stop, as well as at 1 h,4 h, 8 h, 24 h, 48 h (Day 3), 168 h (Day 8), and 336 h (Day 15) after infusion stop in cycle 1 and cycle 4; 0 h in cycle 2, cycle 3 and cycle 5; pre-dose (0 h) will be collected in every other cycle for the subsequent cycles. i.e., in cycle 6, cycle 8, … etc.; at EOT/early withdraw from the study (if the EOT/early withdraw occur when PK blood sampling isn't stipulated). The timepoints of PK sample may be adjusted base on the human PK data. The blood samples for PK analysis will be collected as much as possible if the subjects end of treatment/early withdraw.

secondary_outcome.measure: Volume of distribution at steady state (Vss)
secondary_outcome.description: To determine the pharmacokinetics (PK) profile of LM302
To determine the pharmacokinetics (PK) profile of LM302
To determine the pharmacokinetics (PK) profile of LM302

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to reach maximum serum concentration (Tmax)
secondary_outcome.description: To determine the pharmacokinetics (PK) profile of LM302
To determine the pharmacokinetics (PK) profile of LM302
To determine the pharmacokinetics (PK) profile of LM302
To determine the pharmacokinetics (PK) profile of LM302
Preliminary anti-tumor activity of LM-302 according to RECIST v1.1 assessed by investigator: objective response rate (ORR, complete response(CR)+ partial response(PR))
Preliminary anti-tumor activity of LM-302 according to RECIST v1.1 assessed by investigator: Duration of response (DOR)
Preliminary anti-tumor activity of LM-302 according to RECIST v1.1 assessed by investigator: disease control rate (DCR, CR+PR+SD)
Preliminary anti-tumor activity of LM-302 according to RECIST v1.1 assessed by investigator:progression-free survival (PFS)

secondary_outcome.measure: To assess the immunogenicity of LM-302;
secondary_outcome.description: Blood samples collected for Anti-Drug Antibody(ADA) assessment will be performed at 0 h of Day 1 (within 30 min prior to infusion) in cycle 1 to Cycle 5; 0 h of Day 1 in every other cycle (within 30 min prior to infusion) for the subsequent cycles, i.e., in cycle 6, cycle 8, … etc., the EOT/early withdraw from the study and safety follow-up. Nab will be detected if necessary.

other_outcome.measure: To explore the correlation between CLDN18.2 expression and anti-tumor activity of LM-302
other_outcome.description: Test CLDN18.2 expression and anti-tumor activity of LM-302

arm_group.description: The dose escalation scheme using the the accelerated titration design for dose 1 and the i3+3 design for the remaining doses. first dose: 0.2mg/kg i.v. every 3 weeks (1 cycle=21 days) , n=1;
The dose escalation scheme using the the accelerated titration design for dose 1 and the i3+3 design for the remaining doses. second dose: 0.4mg/kg i.v. every 3 weeks (1 cycle=21 days) , n=3;
The dose escalation scheme using the the accelerated titration design for dose 1 and the i3+3 design for the remaining doses. third dose: 0.8mg/kg i.v. every 3 weeks (1 cycle=21 days) , n=6;
The dose escalation scheme using the the accelerated titration design for dose 1 and the i3+3 design for the remaining doses. fourth dose: 1.6mg/kg i.v. every 3 weeks (1 cycle=21 days) , n=6;
The dose escalation scheme using the the accelerated titration design for dose 1 and the i3+3 design for the remaining doses. fifth dose: 1.6mg/kg i.v. every 3 weeks (1 cycle=21 days) , n=9;
The dose escalation scheme using the the accelerated titration design for dose 1 and the i3+3 design for the remaining doses. sixth dose: 1.6mg/kg i.v. every 3 weeks (1 cycle=21 days) , n=12;

intervention.description: All subjects will be administered every 3 weeks (1 cycle=21 days) with a dose of LM-302 intravenous infusion on day 1 until meet the criteria of treatment discontinuation or withdraw, whichever occurs earlier.

overall_official.affiliation: City of Hope National Medical Center
The University of Texas MD Anderson
